```{r}
fact_rec <- \(n) if (n == 0) 1 else n * fact_rec(n - 1)
fact_rec(5)
```


```{r}
mult_rec <- \(x) \(y)
  if (x == 0) 0 else y + mult_rec(x - 1)(y)
```

```{r}
mult_rec(6)(7)
```


```{r}
Y <- \(f) {
  g <- \(x) f(x(x))
  g(g)
}
```


```{r}
Y <- \(f) {
  g <- \(x) f(x(x))
  g(g)
}
fact <- \(f) \(n)
  if (n == 0) 1 else n * f(n - 1)
Y(fact)(5)
```

```{r}
Y <- \(f) (\(x) f(x(x)))(\(x) f(x(x)))
fact <- \(f) \(n) if (n == 0) 1 else n * f(n - 1)
Y(fact)(5)
```

```{r}
(\(f) (\(x) f(x(x)))(\(x) f(x(x)))) (\(f) \(n) if (n == 0) 1 else n * f(n - 1)) (5)
```




```{r}
mult <- \(f) \(x) \(y)
  if (x == 0) 0 else y + f(x - 1)(y)
```


```{r}
Y(mult)(7)(6)
```



```{r}
mult <- \(f) \(x, y)
  if (x == 0) 0 else y + f(x - 1, y)

Y(mult)(6, 7)
```



```{r}
(\(f) (\(x) f(x(x)))(\(x) f(x(x)))) (\(f) \(x) \(y) if (x == 0) 0 else y + f(x - 1)(y)) (6) (7)
```
